descriptionHtml:
1. Legates wear retextured gilded heavy armor.
2. Officers and fort commanders wear vanilla heavy armor with officer helmet.
3. Rikke - she's general's right hand, so she wears unique cuirass and gilded boots and gauntlets. In battle she puts on unique gilded officer helmet. (If I only knew where to put skript to take that helmet off after the war ends...)

Why Rikke's armor is more colorful the general's? Well, she's a soldier, but still a woman ;)

Two versions:
"Legion_command_armor" just retextures the characters.
"Legion_command_armor_get" contains the full set in the armory downstairs (but Riike's cuirass remains unique)

The versions are standalone - you don't need to download both.

New game is not needed, but if you already stared Civil War, Rikke will remain as she is , cause her outfit is changed with the script.
If some characters are naked - just press ~ to open console, click the naked character and type resetinventory.

REQUERD NOTHING.
Recommended one of these mods:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9222/?
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70528/?
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12987/?
 
For not only officers wear heavy armor :)

...and
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16317/?

For better stats of imperial armor.

PERMISSIONS:
Do whatever you want as long as you credit me.
But NO COMMERCIAL USE cause f*** the commerce!

Long live the Empire!

P.S. If you know how to change Civil War rewards  - contact me, I wanna make these armor to be a reward for new ranks (become questor - get the officer helmet, become tribune - get the quirass, become the legate - get the helmet, gauntlets and boots )
author: Alex
